import { ArrowBackIosNew, Edit } from "@mui/icons-material"; import { Button, Container, Divider, Grid, IconButton, Typography, } from "@mui/material"; import { Box } from "@mui/system"; import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import MUIRichTextEditor from "mui-rte"; const HealthAccess = () => { const { healthAccess } = useSelector((state) => state.homepage); const history = useHistory(); return (



TITLE {healthAccess?.title}

DESCRIPTION {healthAccess?.description}
); }; export default HealthAccess;
